title: NASA unveils a new spacesuit astronauts will wear on the moon
description: The new suits will cater to a wider range of body types and allow astronauts more mobility.

title: AI is reviving San Francisco’s tech scene. Welcome to ‘Cerebral Valley.’
description: The money and power flooding into AI are warping and intensifying the typical Silicon Valley gold rush, now set to explode with the launch of GPT-4.

title: Workout content is taking over social media. Here’s how to banish it.
description: Fitness inspiration is everywhere. Here's how to see less of it if it's negatively impacting your body image, eating habits or social media use.

title: Meta starts cutting 10,000 workers in second round of layoffs
description: Facebook parent company Meta is slashing its workforce, part of a wave of layoffs roiling Silicon Valley during an uncertain economic climate.
